definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位

pinyin: ming2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

definition: PhD degree (Doctor of Philosophy)/also abbr. to 博士學位|博士学位
pinyin: zhe2 xue2 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

definition: to study for a degree/to take a degree course

pinyin: rong2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

sentences.english: Xie Zhaohua received a doctor degree in Law from University of Paris XI, France, in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年在法国巴黎第十一大学获得法学博士学位。

sentences.english: Meg graduated from Taiwan's Ming-Chuan College with a BA degree in Tourism Management.
sentences.chinese: 吴湘玲毕业于台湾铭传大学，获旅游管理学士学位。

sentences.english: This double-degree is jointly offered by the Faculty of Arts and the Faculty of Education.
sentences.chinese: 此项双学位课程由文学院与教育学院合办。

sentences.english: So, in effect, the act of degree classification trivialises the student's achievement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，学位分级制度实际上轻视了学生的学习成绩。

sentences.english: In 1989 he graduated from the Xian Academy of Fine Arts with a degree in oil painting.
sentences.chinese: 1989年毕业于西安美院油画系，获得学士学位。

sentences.english: I held the B. A. degree in English from Zhejiang Univerisity.
sentences.chinese: 我取得了浙江大学的英语学士学位。

sentences.english: I am currently pursuing a PhD degree in Bioinformatics at the UofM.
sentences.chinese: 本人现在正在攻读生物信息学博士的学位。

sentences.english: This is a professional master degree.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个职业硕士学位。

sentences.english: Zhang Ming graduated from Beijing University of Post and Telecommunications with degree of M. S. in computer science.
sentences.chinese: 张明毕业于北京邮电大学，获得计算机科学硕士学位。

sentences.english: Students can choose according to their interest in professional degree curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 学生可根据自己的兴趣选择专业学位课程。

sentences.english: He has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有斯坦福大学计算机科学博士学位。

sentences.english: Why do so many students choose the second major?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么那么多的学生都选择了双学位呢？

sentences.english: Ivy graduated from Imperial College, London with a Master degree in Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 陈嘉蔚毕业于伦敦帝国学院拥有工程硕士学位。

sentences.english: Nearly 200 of the CEOs have no graduate-level degree.
sentences.chinese: 而将近有200位CEO没有硕士学位。

sentences.english: Jibing Chen got both Bachelor's and Master degree from Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.chinese: 他在清华大学获得自动化专业学士和硕士学位。

sentences.english: She attended East Carolina University and earned an English degree.
sentences.chinese: 她出席东卡罗来纳大学，并获得英语学位。

definition: doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child

pinyin: gong1 shang1 guan3 li3 shuo4 shi4
